title: Nosh Eatery and Tap
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Opened early 2014, restaurant/hot spot in the Broadway business district is aimed at encouraging a healthy and plant based diet. The unique and contemporary atmosphere of the space pairs perfectly with the alternative menu choices, such as an in-house-made beet burger, sweet pea pancakes, and a quinoa risotto. Dominantly vegetarian menu is marked with over 15 vegan choices, as well as many gluten free and raw choices.
